com.rapidminer.extension.indatabase.gui

Class TableParameterChooser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rapidminer.extension.indatabase.gui.TableParameterChooser

  • public class TableParameterChooser
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to encapsulate the operator parameters to choose a table from a schema.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TableParameterChooser(com.rapidminer.operator.Operator operator, java.lang.String schemaKey, java.lang.String tableKey)

    • Method Detail

      • getParameterTypes

        public java.util.List<com.rapidminer.parameter.ParameterType> getParameterTypes(java.lang.String tableHelpString,
                                                                                boolean suggestExistingTables)
        Creates ParameterType objects needed by the user in order to choose a table from the a schema.
        Parameters:
        tableHelpString - Information from the table. Information will be shown on the GUI.
        suggestExistingTables - Allow the user to choose from a drop-down menu of existing tables.
        Returns:
        Returns the list of parameter types.

      • getSchemaName

        public java.lang.String getSchemaName()
        Returns:
        Returns the chosen schema if any. Returns null otherwise.

      • getTableNameForDisplay

        public java.lang.String getTableNameForDisplay()
                                        throws com.rapidminer.parameter.UndefinedParameterError
        Returns the name of the chosen table in the format "''.''". Result is NOT enclosed in database-specific quotes, so it should ONLY be used for display purposes, not in a query.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        com.rapidminer.parameter.UndefinedParameterError

      • getTableBaseName

        public java.lang.String getTableBaseName()
                                  throws com.rapidminer.parameter.UndefinedParameterError
        Returns:
        Returns the name of the chosen table. The result won't contain the database (scheme) prefix.
        Throws:
        com.rapidminer.parameter.UndefinedParameterError

      • checkTable

        public void checkTable(boolean forceReload)
                throws DbTableException,
                       com.rapidminer.operator.UserError,
                       java.sql.SQLException
        Parameters:
        forceReload - Forces CachedDatabaseHandler to reload its table cache.
        Throws:
        DbTableException
        java.sql.SQLException
        com.rapidminer.operator.UserError

      • checkSchema

        public boolean checkSchema(boolean forceReload)
                    throws com.rapidminer.operator.UserError,
                           java.sql.SQLException
        Throws:
        com.rapidminer.operator.UserError
        java.sql.SQLException

      • checkSchemaThrowUserError

        public void checkSchemaThrowUserError()
                               throws com.rapidminer.operator.UserError,
                                      java.sql.SQLException
        Throws specific error when invalid database selected.
        Throws:
        com.rapidminer.operator.UserError
        java.sql.SQLException

      • addProcessSetupErrors

        public boolean addProcessSetupErrors()
        Adds errors to the operator if non-existent schema or table is chosen, or there is any other error during checking that. Returns true only if the chosen table exists in the chosen schema.
